product_overview: Crypto Rapper AI is an interactive AI-powered cryptocurrency trading assistant that delivers real-time market analysis, technical trading insights, and entertaining rap-style summaries. It provides a chat interface powered by Google's Gemini API, real-time market data integration, and comprehensive crypto trading tools for both beginners and experienced traders.
core_goals: Enable natural language conversational AI interaction for crypto trading advice and analysis.
Provide real-time market data and price tracking for major cryptocurrencies.
Offer advanced technical analysis including RSI, MACD, and price action.
Deliver engaging rap summaries to make market analysis entertaining and memorable.
Allow secure user authentication and personalized profile management.
Support trading strategy backtesting and portfolio tracking features.
Ensure highly responsive and performant user experience on desktop and mobile devices.
key_features: ChatGPT-style conversational interface with message bubbles, typing indicators, and markdown support.
Integration with Google Gemini API for AI-powered crypto trading advice and rap generation.
Real-time cryptocurrency price ticker with data from Binance and CoinGecko APIs.
Portfolio management and profit & loss calculation for multiple cryptocurrencies.
Interactive charts featuring multiple timeframes and technical indicators using Chart.js.
Robust user authentication system with registration, login, logout, and session persistence.
Customizable price alerts with notifications based on user-defined thresholds.
Market sentiment dashboard showing overall mood and confidence levels.
Voice command support for hands-free interaction with the AI assistant.
Dark/light theme toggle with persistent user preferences.
Persistent chat history with typewriter effect and conversation memory.
Quick action buttons for frequent queries and analysis.
Trading strategy backtesting engine for popular indicators like RSI, MACD, EMA, and Bollinger Bands.
Secure API key management for Gemini API and user profile settings.
Performance optimizations including GPU acceleration and 120fps UI rendering.
Mobile-responsive design optimized for touch interactions.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in to the app and sets trading preferences including API keys and risk tolerance.
User initiates chat by typing or voice command, asking questions about specific cryptocurrencies.
AI processes the query using Gemini API and market data to provide real-time analysis and rap summaries.
User views live market ticker and interactive charts for detailed price and technical indicator information.
Users can manage their portfolio, set price alerts, and receive notifications when targets are hit.
Users utilize backtesting tools to simulate trading strategies against historical data and evaluate performance.
User can toggle dark/light theme and update profile settings at any time.
Chat history is saved and loaded for continuity in conversations.
validation_criteria: All core functionalities tested on supported browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge.
Secure and persistent user authentication with correct session management.
Correct and timely real-time market data updates with graceful fallback.
Accurate AI responses with relevant trading analysis and rap content.
Responsive UI with consistent performance at 120fps on typical hardware.
Correct operation of portfolio tracker, price alert system, and backtesting engine.
Voice commands correctly recognized and executed.
User preferences including theme and profile settings persist across sessions.
Chat history accurately stored and restored with formatted display.
Mobile and desktop layouts render correctly and are fully usable.
Performance optimizations verified through profiling and load testing.

features.name: User Authentication System
features.description: Complete user registration, login, logout, and session management with localStorage persistence. Includes profile management and user preferences.

features.name: AI Crypto Trading Chat
features.description: Interactive AI chatbot powered by Gemini API that provides crypto trading advice, market analysis, and personalized recommendations based on real-time market data.

features.name: Real-Time Market Data Ticker
features.description: Live cryptocurrency price ticker showing BTC, ETH, and SOL prices with 24h changes. Uses Binance WebSocket and REST API with fallback mechanisms.

features.name: Portfolio Tracker
features.description: User portfolio management system to track crypto holdings, calculate P&L, display current values, and manage multiple cryptocurrency positions.

features.name: Price Alerts System
features.description: Cryptocurrency price alert functionality allowing users to set custom price thresholds and get notified when prices hit targets.

features.name: Interactive Charts
features.description: Dynamic cryptocurrency price charts using Chart.js with multiple timeframes, historical data visualization, and technical indicators.

features.name: Trading Strategy Backtesting
features.description: Backtesting engine for testing trading strategies (RSI, MACD, EMA, Bollinger Bands) against historical data with performance metrics and trade history.

features.name: Market Sentiment Analysis
features.description: Sentiment analysis dashboard showing market mood and confidence levels for crypto assets.

features.name: Voice Commands
features.description: Voice recognition system for hands-free interaction with the crypto trading assistant.

features.name: Theme Switcher
features.description: Dark/light theme toggle with persistent user preference storage.

features.name: Profile Settings
features.description: User profile management with trading preferences, risk tolerance, experience level, currency preferences, and API key configuration.

features.name: Chat History Management
features.description: Persistent chat history storage with typewriter effect, markdown formatting, and conversation memory system.

features.name: Quick Action Buttons
features.description: Predefined quick action buttons for common queries and analysis requests.

features.name: Performance Optimizations
features.description: GPU acceleration, requestAnimationFrame throttling, passive event listeners, and CSS optimizations for 120fps UI performance.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Mobile-responsive layout with adaptive components and touch-friendly interactions.
